pages.headerText: A refreshing new way to fly.
pages.descriptionText: Mint is JetBlue's refreshing new take on a premium coast-to-coast experience. With fully lie-flat seats, top-notch service, artisanal dining options and revitalizing amenities, you're sure to arrive in mint conditions.
